data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Kraj Vysočina prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kraj Vysočina, Czechia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Kraj Vysočina.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Kraj Vysočina, Czechia with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 3,812 believers in the state of Kraj Vysočina with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, help the 3,812 believers in Kraj Vysočina to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Kraj Vysočina, Czechia so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 3,812 believers in Kraj Vysočina.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me
